data.title: 150 years since the Birth of Guglielmo Marconi, the Father of Wireless Telegraphy and Inspiration for TTC MARCONI
data.meta_description: On April 25, 1874, an Italian physicist and inventor Guglielmo Marconi was born. He went on to become a Nobel Prize laureate as well as a pioneer in the field of telecommunications. His revolutionary work laid the foundations for modern telecommunication technologies, which we are still using today. Marconi´s vision of connecting a world without [...]
data.text:
On April 25, 1874, an Italian physicist and inventor Guglielmo Marconi was born. He went on to become a Nobel Prize laureate as well as a pioneer in the field of telecommunications. His revolutionary work laid the foundations for modern telecommunication technologies, which we are still using today.

Marconi´s vision of connecting a world without wire also inspired TTC MARCONI. The company was founded in 1993 as a result of the partnership between the Czech company TESLA TELEKOMUNIKACE and the Italian company MARCONI. In the TTC Group, we carry on the legacy of Marconi´s innovative spirit and continue in his effort to shift the boundaries of telecommunications.

Foto: Shutterstock
